verbs.description: President Trump [V: has] been cutting money - draining red tape at a quick pace , but a regulatory budget would cement the benefits for American citizens .
President Trump has [V: been] cutting money - draining red tape at a quick pace , but a regulatory budget would cement the benefits for American citizens .

President Trump has been cutting money - draining red tape at a quick pace , but a regulatory budget [V: would] cement the benefits for American citizens .
